name: Densha de GO! 2 Kousoku-hen 3000-bandai
overview: Densha de Go! is a Japanese series of arcade train driving games. The goal for the players is to stop the train at the stations in exactly the right position while keeping up with the schedule, obeying all traffic rules, and ensuring the safety and comfort of their passengers. In order to celebrate 3000 active Densha de Go! 2 arcade units, Taito released an extended "3000 units" edition to the arcades, which was later ported to other systems. In addition to the routes of Densha de Go! 2, this edition includes the following routes: Akita Shinkansen from Ōmagari to Morioka Akita Shinkansen from Akita to Shin-Hanamaki Ōu Main Line from Akita to Omagari Tazawako Line from Tazawako to Morioka Keihin-Tōhoku Line from Yokohama to Shinagawa Keihin-Tōhoku Line from Yokohama to Ueno Tōkaidō Main Line from Osaka to Kobe Yamanote Line (Outer Circle) from Tokyo to Shinjuku
